name: Spaghetti Swing (Milk Jam 1)
description:
This is the game I made for my first Game Jam - Milk Jam 1.

You play as spaghetti and meatballs, with a side of soda! This game took over 24 hours to make, and hopefully you'll enjoy it!

 I'm not sure if the Linux build works since I haven't tested it so let me know.

Art and programming by me
Cover art made in cooperation with my friend YABO

Sound/Music Credits:

Sad Trombone
Grapple Sound
Spaghetti Walking
Soda Walking
Jump

Lets Make This Quick - Title
Cherry Cola - Intro
Sunny Dreams - Levels
